item.title: all day i dream about spanish encyclopedias
item.description: so all day.. everyday.. for the last couple weeks, I have been developing a spanish site for my employer. heh. it rules. and I don’t even know spanish.last night we went to puffy ami yumi. it was so much fun. they are veyr sarcastic and humorous. I caught the water bottle they threw at the crowd, but gave it to the women in fron tof me who wanted it so much better.
